rationales.self_direction: She continues choosing studio practice over the civil-service path her aunt pushes.
rationales.conformity: She keeps the exchange polite and avoids confrontation, managing family pressure without open conflict.

rationales.tradition: She evaluates a lucrative collaboration against her grandmother's craft ethic and inherited standards.

rationales.achievement: She invested heavily in the Arita residency application because of what the credential could validate.
rationales.conformity: She performs enthusiastic support in messages despite disappointment to maintain social harmony.

rationales.achievement: She returns to precise production work on show pieces despite emotional setback.
rationales.tradition: Her quality standard is explicitly grounded in techniques taught by her grandmother.

rationales.self_direction: She independently rejects a profitable collaboration despite peer pressure to be more practical.
rationales.tradition: She prioritizes a lineage-based model of craft integrity over trend-driven branding opportunities.

rationales.benevolence: She continues transferring money to her mother even when her own payment is lower than expected.
rationales.security: She closely tracks her shrinking emergency cushion and financial runway entering winter.

rationales.tradition: She sustains family rituals by making lunar new year gifts with her grandmother's glaze method.
rationales.security: She finds steadiness in controlled, repeatable studio routines and a calm, low-urgency environment.
